PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PipeSegmentTypeGutter
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Gutter segment type common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: Slope
PropertyDef.Definition: Angle of the gutter to allow for drainage

PropertyDef.Name: FlowRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Actual flow capacity for the gutter. Value of 0.00 means this value has not been set.
